aiReadinessQuestions.prompt: Our district has a formal AI strategy that aligns with our educational mission and strategic plan.
aiReadinessQuestions.helpText: Evaluate whether your district has documented AI goals, policies, and implementation roadmap.
aiReadinessQuestions.contextPrompt: Describe your current AI strategy documentation and governance structure.

aiReadinessQuestions.prompt: We have designated leadership responsible for AI initiatives and decision-making.
aiReadinessQuestions.helpText: Consider whether there's clear accountability and decision-making authority for AI projects.

aiReadinessQuestions.prompt: Our AI governance framework addresses ethics, student privacy, and responsible AI use in K-12 settings.
aiReadinessQuestions.helpText: Assess your policies for ethical AI use, bias prevention, and COPPA/FERPA compliance.

aiReadinessQuestions.prompt: We have established metrics and KPIs to measure AI initiative success and student outcomes.
aiReadinessQuestions.helpText: Consider whether you track learning outcomes, efficiency gains, and other success indicators for AI projects.

aiReadinessQuestions.prompt: Our budget planning includes dedicated funding for AI initiatives and educational technology infrastructure.
aiReadinessQuestions.helpText: Evaluate whether AI investments are formally planned and budgeted.

aiReadinessQuestions.prompt: We regularly review and update our AI strategy based on emerging educational technologies and outcomes.
aiReadinessQuestions.helpText: Consider how often you reassess AI strategy and adapt to new developments in education.

aiReadinessQuestions.prompt: Teachers are trained and supported in integrating AI tools into their classroom instruction.
aiReadinessQuestions.helpText: Assess the level of teacher professional development and support for AI-enhanced instruction.
aiReadinessQuestions.contextPrompt: Describe current teacher training programs and support for AI integration.

aiReadinessQuestions.prompt: We have developed curriculum guidelines for appropriate AI use in lessons and student assessments.
aiReadinessQuestions.helpText: Consider whether there are clear policies about when and how AI can be used in K-12 education.

aiReadinessQuestions.prompt: Students receive age-appropriate education about AI literacy, digital citizenship, and responsible use.
aiReadinessQuestions.helpText: Evaluate student preparation for working with AI tools responsibly at their grade level.

aiReadinessQuestions.prompt: Our learning management systems and educational technology integrate effectively with AI tools.
aiReadinessQuestions.helpText: Assess technical integration between existing systems and AI applications.

aiReadinessQuestions.prompt: We regularly assess the impact of AI integration on student learning outcomes and achievement.
aiReadinessQuestions.helpText: Consider whether you measure and evaluate the effectiveness of AI in K-12 education.

aiReadinessQuestions.prompt: Our IT infrastructure can support the computational requirements of educational AI applications.
aiReadinessQuestions.helpText: Evaluate processing power, storage, and network capacity for AI workloads.
aiReadinessQuestions.contextPrompt: Describe your current computing infrastructure and any cloud resources.

aiReadinessQuestions.prompt: We have secure, accessible data systems that can support AI analytics while protecting student information.
aiReadinessQuestions.helpText: Consider data quality, accessibility, and security for AI applications in K-12 settings.

aiReadinessQuestions.prompt: Our cybersecurity measures are adequate for protecting AI systems and sensitive student data.
aiReadinessQuestions.helpText: Assess security protocols specifically for AI applications and student data protection.

aiReadinessQuestions.prompt: We have established data governance practices that support AI development while ensuring student privacy.
aiReadinessQuestions.helpText: Evaluate data management, quality control, and privacy protection processes.

aiReadinessQuestions.prompt: Our technology team has the skills and resources to implement and maintain AI systems in educational settings.
aiReadinessQuestions.helpText: Consider technical expertise, staffing, and ongoing support capabilities.

aiReadinessQuestions.prompt: We have reliable backup and disaster recovery systems for AI-critical educational applications.
aiReadinessQuestions.helpText: Assess business continuity planning for AI-dependent educational processes.

aiReadinessQuestions.prompt: Our district's culture is open to innovation and educational technology change.
aiReadinessQuestions.helpText: Evaluate organizational readiness for adopting new educational technologies and processes.
aiReadinessQuestions.contextPrompt: Describe your district's approach to innovation and change management.

aiReadinessQuestions.prompt: Staff and teachers are generally receptive to AI tools that can improve educational outcomes and efficiency.
aiReadinessQuestions.helpText: Consider attitudes toward automation and AI-assisted educational processes.

aiReadinessQuestions.prompt: We have effective change management processes for implementing new AI initiatives in schools.
aiReadinessQuestions.helpText: Assess your ability to plan, communicate, and execute technology implementations across the district.

aiReadinessQuestions.prompt: Leadership actively champions AI adoption and provides visible support for educational technology initiatives.
aiReadinessQuestions.helpText: Evaluate leadership engagement and communication about AI priorities in education.

aiReadinessQuestions.prompt: We have processes for addressing concerns and resistance to AI implementation from teachers and parents.
aiReadinessQuestions.helpText: Consider how you handle skepticism, fear, or resistance to AI adoption in educational settings.

aiReadinessQuestions.prompt: We understand and comply with relevant K-12 regulations (FERPA, COPPA, state privacy laws) as they apply to AI use.
aiReadinessQuestions.helpText: Assess regulatory compliance for AI applications in K-12 education.
aiReadinessQuestions.contextPrompt: Describe your approach to regulatory compliance for AI systems in K-12 settings.

aiReadinessQuestions.prompt: We have conducted risk assessments for AI implementation across different educational and operational areas.
aiReadinessQuestions.helpText: Consider whether you've evaluated potential risks and mitigation strategies for K-12 AI use.

aiReadinessQuestions.prompt: Our procurement and vendor management processes address AI-specific requirements and student privacy risks.
aiReadinessQuestions.helpText: Evaluate your approach to selecting and managing AI vendors and educational technology services.

ai_strategy.name: AI Strategy & Governance
ai_strategy.description: District-wide planning, leadership, and governance for AI initiatives

pedagogical_integration.name: Pedagogical Integration
pedagogical_integration.description: AI adoption in teaching, learning, and curriculum delivery

technology_infrastructure.name: Technology Infrastructure
technology_infrastructure.description: Technical capacity and systems to support AI implementation in schools

organizational_readiness.name: Organizational Culture & Change Management
organizational_readiness.description: District culture, change management, and stakeholder readiness

compliance_risk.name: Compliance & Risk Management
compliance_risk.description: Regulatory compliance, risk assessment, and student privacy protection

scale.1: Strongly Disagree / Not at all ready

interpretation.0-20: Beginning - Significant AI readiness development needed
interpretation.21-40: Developing - Some AI foundations in place, major gaps remain
interpretation.41-60: Progressing - Moderate AI readiness with room for improvement
interpretation.61-80: Advanced - Strong AI readiness with minor enhancements needed
interpretation.81-100: Exemplary - Comprehensive AI readiness across all domains

k12-ai-pulse-check.name: K-12 AI Pulse Check
k12-ai-pulse-check.description: Quick AI readiness assessment for K-12 school districts

ai-readiness-comprehensive.name: K-12 AI Readiness Comprehensive
ai-readiness-comprehensive.description: Comprehensive AI readiness evaluation for school districts with detailed insights

ai-transformation-blueprint.name: K-12 AI Transformation Blueprint
ai-transformation-blueprint.description: Strategic AI implementation roadmap for district-wide deployment

ai-enterprise-partnership.name: K-12 AI Enterprise Partnership
ai-enterprise-partnership.description: Ongoing AI partnership with continuous support and optimization for large districts
